title: Woman found dead at house as man, 44, arrested on suspicion of murder
text:
Get the biggest daily news stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

A woman was found dead at a house before a 44-year-old man was arrested on suspicion of murder.

Police were called to an address in Hyde Green, Beaconsfield, in Buckinghamshire at 6.15am today and discovered the body of a woman in her forties.

A 44-year-old man has been arrested and is being held in custody while officers from Thames Valley Police investigate the scene.

Head of Crime for Thames Valley Police, Ian Hunter, said residents are likely to see an increase in police presence, but officers believe this was an isolated incident.

Police are appealing for anyone with information to come forward.

(Image: HNP Newsdesk/Hyde News & Pictures Ltd)

(Image: HNP Newsdesk/Hyde News & Pictures Ltd)

Mr Hunter said: "Detectives from the Major Crime Unit are investigating the circumstances of the incident, and trying to establish exactly how this woman has died.

"We are appealing for anyone who has any information that could assist us to come forward and contact police.

"If you have any details which you think are relevant to this incident, please call Thames Valley Police on 101, quoting URN 119 29/10."
description: Police were called to a property in Hyde Green, Beaconsfield, in Buckinghamshire at 6.15am and discovered the body of a woman in her forties
